Judul: Typological Descriptions as Generative Guides for Historical Architecture
Abstrak:
This paper presents a description grammar approach in the context of
the generation of historical architectural typologies. The specific architectural
context is classical period Ottoman mosques of the architect Sinan.
Kata Kunci: Historical architecture  Building typology  Ontology  Design generation  Shape grammar  Description grammarHistorical architecture  Building typology  Ontology  Design generation  Shape grammar  Description grammar
